page-pvp-blurb: 每小时更新当前PvP排行榜状态.
page-pvp-desc: Current PvP standings for Gems of War, updated hourly.
page-events-blurb: 每日更新即将展开的各项活动.
page-events-desc: List of future events for Gems of War, updated daily.
page-tasks-blurb: 每日更新探险任务及战役.
page-tasks-desc: Adventure Board and Campaign Tasks for Gems of War, updated daily.
page-guild-blurb: 每小时更新当前公会的奖杯和级别排名.

page-guildwars-blurb: 每日更新当前公会会战排名及分数.
page-guildwars-desc: Current Guild Wars brackets and scores for Gems of War, updated hourly.
page-soulforge-blurb: 查询当前灵魂锻造内容，对后续内容进行预测.
page-soulforge-desc: View the current Soulforge rotation for Gems of War, and predict future recipes.
page-assets-desc: Peruse the Gems of War graphics and audio.
